title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 330.5 - Review of committee recommendations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 330.5 - Review of committee recommendations

State Regulations

Subsequent to any meeting of the committee, the Deputy

Comptroller shall independently review the investments affirmatively
recommended by the committee. Such recommendations shall be considered advisory
only, and the Comptroller may, within his sole discretion, refuse to make any
such investment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
330.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
